title: Name Change Requirements, What are They/Why Can't I Change Mine
body: I am trying to change my name, Brohawk, to The Flock of Teemo, but it keeps telling me "make sure it meets the requirements, but there are no requirements shown on the name change page.

replies.body: Unfortunately, your name has too many characters past the limit.  Per our [Summoner Name FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752814-Summoner-Name-FAQ), your name must be at least 3 characters long and no more than 16 characters long including spaces.
